snippet: “There is every indication that the improvement may be a reflection of a broader pickup in overall economic activity,” said Millan Mulraine, an economist at TD Securities.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports United States economy ended 2012 on surprisingly sound note as factory output increased and low inflation lifted buying power of consumers; roundup of regional economic conditions in Fed's 12 districts finds economy continues to grow modestly.
lead_paragraph: “There is every indication that the improvement may be a reflection of a broader pickup in overall economic activity,” said Millan Mulraine, an economist at TD Securities.

headline.seo: Economy Ended the Year on an Upbeat Note
headline.main: Economy Ended the Year With Factory Output Up and Inflation Low
headline.print_headline: Economy Ended the Year With Factory Output Up and Inflation Low
